thx.core

Generic multi-purpose library. thx.core aims to be the lodash library for Haxe.

helper classes

It contains a lot of useful helper classes to simplify dealing with a lot of types from the standard library.

new basic types

It also provides new common types that should probably be part of the standard library: Error, Nil, Set and Tuple.

macro helpers

thx.core also includes a few helpers to more easily write and deal with macros.
